name: VisitSanta
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: visit santa
des:
Use your Alexa to Visit Santa's Grotto.
Santa will Welcome you to his virtual grotto and ask if you have been well behaved.
He will ask if you will leave him anything on Christmas Eve. (Maybe a Mince Pie)
He will then ask that you go to bed early on Christmas eve.
If you are lucky and been good this year you will also get something from Santa.

Santa's Grotto is open from the 2nd of November till Christmas Eve.

Merry Christmas

Enjoy! 

HUGO FM
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
